text: Pennzoil 400 may refer to either of two annual NASCAR Cup Series stock car races: * Pennzoil 400 (Las Vegas), formerly the Kolbalt 400, at Las Vegas Motor Speedway, Nevada * Pennzoil 400 (Homestead-Miami), former name of the Dixie Vodka 400, at Homestead-Miami Speedway, Florida
title: Pennzoil 400
